analyzed: ba zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //

translated: Subhūti, if a bodhisattva hears this seal of entry into the letters beginning with A, and these words of the seal of entry into the letters beginning with A,

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o //

analyzed: de @279b la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba gang zhe na /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /

original: mang po lta ci smos te /
analyzed: mang po lta ci smos te /
translated: How much more so for a great favor!

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s gratitude and recognition of benefits received.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s patience and endurance?

original: sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing 'tshe ba med pa'i sems te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing 'tshe ba med pa'i sems te /
translated: It is the absence of malice and the absence of violence toward all sentient beings.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s patience that is based on the power of endurance.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s experience of joy and delight?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: sems can thams cad theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa ste /
translated: bringing all sentient beings to maturity in the three vehicles.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s experience of joy and delight.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s not abandoning any sentient being?🔽It is this:

original: 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste /
translated: protecting all sentient beings.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s not abandoning any sentient being.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s realization of great compassion?

original: byang chub sems @280a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems @280a *//
translated: Bodhisattva

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Mahāsattva, when practicing the bodhisattva conduct,

original: 'di snyam du sems shing bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sems shing bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste /
translated: thinks like this: ‘For the sake of each and every sentient being, I will remain in the hells for eons as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lam bkod kyi bar du /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lam bkod kyi bar du /
translated: Until all sentient beings are established in the wisdom of the buddhas,

original: de dag tu gtub cing gshag pa dang / brdung zhing btso ba dang / bsreg pa la sogs pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam ste /
analyzed: de dag tu gtub cing gshag pa dang / brdung zhing btso ba dang / bsreg pa la sogs pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam ste /
translated: I will experience being cut, split, beaten, boiled, burned, and so forth in those places.’

original: de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don du spro zhing skyo ba med pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don du spro zhing skyo ba med pa ste /
translated: Thus, for the sake of all sentient beings, he is enthusiastic and never discouraged.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s realization of great compassion.”

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s honoring and revering the guru with faith and respect?

original: 'di ltar bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes su byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes su byed pa ste /
translated: It is the attitude of regarding the guru as the Teacher.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s honoring and revering the guru with faith and respect.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing 'tshol ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing 'tshol ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s striving and seeking the perfections?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: las gzhan med par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su 'tshol ba ste /
analyzed: las gzhan med par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su 'tshol ba ste /
translated: without any other work, seeking the perfections without any other work in order to ripen all beings.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing 'tshol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing 'tshol ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s striving and seeking the perfections.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' @280b sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' @280b sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ insatiable thirst for learning consist in?

original: 'di lta ste /🔽sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am /
translated: It is this:

original: phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gang ji snyed cig bstan pa de dag thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes mi ngoms pa ste /
analyzed: phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gang ji snyed cig bstan pa de dag thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes mi ngoms pa ste /
translated: the bodhisattvas think, ‘I will retain all the teachings that the blessed buddhas have revealed in this world system or in all the world systems of the ten directions.’

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ insatiable thirst for learning.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattvas’ discernment of the gift of Dharma, which is free of material concerns, consist in?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings teach the Dharma,

original: chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub tu'ang re ba med pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub tu'ang re ba med pa ste /
translated: they do not even hope for awakening through the gift of Dharma, let alone for any other reward.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s discernment of the gift of the Dharma without material possessions.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s planting of roots of goodness and dedication for the purification of the buddha-land?

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /
translated: The roots of goodness by which one purifies the buddha-land,

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi zhing yongs su spyod ba'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi zhing yongs su spyod ba'i tshe /
translated: when one is cultivating the field of one’s own mind and the minds of others,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ste /

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s planting of roots of goodness and dedication for the purification of the buddha-land.

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa @281a *//

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar brten na /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar brten na /
translated: It is the roots of virtue that are supported by which

translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s not being discouraged by the immensity of saṃsāra.

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o //

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s not abandoning the solitary life?

analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ba ste /

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi btang ba'o //

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i @281b chog shes pa gang zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa'o //

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi gtong ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ not giving up the restraint of the ascetic practices.

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na /

analyzed: bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ not giving up the training.

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na /

analyzed: 'dod pa'i sems mi bskyed pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa'o //

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na /

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o //

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba gang zhe na /

original: phyi @282a *// nang gi chos thams cad 'dzin pa med pa ste /
analyzed: phyi @282a *// nang gi chos thams cad 'dzin pa med pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba'o //

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa gang zhe na /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa gnas pa la de'i sems mi gnas pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa'o //

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa gang zhe na /

analyzed: dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s absence of concern for all things.

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing rdzus te skye ba dang / skra bregs shing ngur smrig gi gos bgo ba ste /

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of intimacy with householders.

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na /

analyzed: de'i rgyus yongs su sgom pa'i sems mi bskyed cing /

analyzed: @282b de'i rgyus gos 'thob par mi byed pa 'di ni /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of intimacy with bhikṣuṇīs.

analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of stinginess regarding the family?

analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste /

analyzed: gang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba de dag sems can 'di dag rang rang gis bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na /

translated: then I should not arouse a stingy mind toward them.’ This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of stinginess regarding the family.

analyzed: 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s avoidance of dwelling in a place of crowds?

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas /
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattva should not dwell in a place of crowds where,

original: nyan thos sam /
analyzed: nyan thos sam /
translated: if he dwells there, he would hear the śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas yod pa 'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas yod pa 'am /

analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am / de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par mi bya ste /
translated: or the occurrence of any talk about them,🔽or the arising of any thought connected with them.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang ba'o //🔽de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar @283a *//
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang ba'o // de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar @283a *//
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ avoidance of crowded places.

original: bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattva great beings’ avoidance of malice consist in?

analyzed: gnod sems dang 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / 'thab mo'i sems sam /

analyzed: rtsod pa'i sems kyi go mi 'byed pa ste / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o //
translated: They do not give any opportunity for thoughts of fighting or quarreling.🔽This is the bodhisattva great beings’ avoidance of malice.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does the bodhisattva great beings’ avoidance of self-praise consist in?

original: phyi nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: phyi nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: It is not seeing any phenomena, internal or external.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s abandonment of self-praise.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s abandonment of disparaging others?

original: phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s abandonment of disparaging others.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: “What is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s abandonment of the ten unwholesome courses of action?

original: de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la'ang bar du gcod na //
analyzed: de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la'ang bar du gcod na //
translated: They are obstacles even to a good rebirth,

original: 'phags pa'i lam lta la ci smos te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam lta la ci smos te /

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta la smos kyang mi dgos kyi /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta la smos kyang mi dgos kyi /
translated: Let alone unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: spang bar bya'o zhes spong ba ste /
analyzed: spang bar bya'o zhes spong ba ste /
translated: “I should abandon it” is the abandonment.

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ abandonment of the ten unwholesome courses of action.

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems @283b dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems @283b dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: “In that regard, how should bodhisattva great beings abandon excessive pride?”

original: de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med na gang gis nga rgyal du 'gyur ba'i lhag pa lta ci smos zhes nga rgyal du mi byed pa ste /

translated: “Since they do not see any dharma at all, what need is there to mention excessive pride?”

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba'o //
